tools.title: HL7 Message Generator
tools.description: Generate valid HL7 v2.x messages with fake or custom data.

fields.title: Message Type
fields.value: ADT - Admit/Discharge/Transfer [ADT], ORM - Order Message [ORM], ORU - Observation Result [ORU], SIU - Scheduling [SIU], RDE - Pharmacy Order [RDE], MDM - Medical Document [MDM], DFT - Financial Transaction [DFT], VXU - Vaccination Update [VXU]
fields.caption: Select the HL7 message type to generate.

fields.title: Event Type
fields.value: A01 - Admit [A01], A02 - Transfer [A02], A03 - Discharge [A03], A04 - Register [A04], A05 - Pre-admit [A05], A08 - Update Patient [A08], A11 - Cancel Admit [A11], A13 - Cancel Discharge [A13], A28 - Add Person [A28], A31 - Update Person [A31], O01 - Order [O01], R01 - Result [R01], S12 - Notification [S12], T02 - Request [T02], P03 - Post Detail [P03], V04 - Vaccine Record [V04]
fields.caption: Select the event type (primarily for ADT messages).

fields.title: Data Source
fields.value: Use form fields only [field], Use bucket data (form fields override) [bucket]
fields.caption: Choose data source. Bucket data can be overridden by form fields below.

fields.title: Bucket Data Path
fields.caption: Optional dot-notation path prefix (e.g., 'hl7' reads from data.hl7.patientFirstName). Leave empty for root level.

fields.title: Patient ID (MRN)
fields.caption: Medical Record Number. Leave empty for random/bucket.

fields.title: Patient First Name
fields.caption: Leave empty for random fake name.

fields.title: Patient Middle Name
fields.caption: Leave empty for none.

fields.title: Patient Last Name
fields.caption: Leave empty for random fake name.

fields.title: Patient Date of Birth
fields.caption: Format: YYYYMMDD (e.g., 19850315). Leave empty for random.

fields.title: Patient Gender
fields.caption: Patient's gender.

fields.title: Patient SSN
fields.caption: Format: 123-45-6789. Leave empty for random.

fields.title: Patient Race
fields.value: Random [random], White [2106-3], Black/African American [2054-5], Asian [2028-9], Native Hawaiian/Pacific Islander [2076-8], American Indian/Alaska Native [1002-5]
fields.caption: CDC race code.

fields.title: Patient Marital Status
fields.caption: Patient's marital status.

fields.title: Patient Street Address
fields.caption: Street address. Leave empty for random.

fields.title: Patient City
fields.caption: City. Leave empty for random.

fields.title: Patient State
fields.caption: State code (e.g., NY, CA). Leave empty for random.

fields.title: Patient ZIP Code
fields.caption: ZIP code. Leave empty for random.

fields.title: Patient Phone
fields.caption: Phone number. Leave empty for random.

fields.title: Attending Physician ID
fields.caption: Provider ID. Leave empty for random.

fields.title: Attending Physician First Name
fields.caption: Leave empty for random.

fields.title: Attending Physician Last Name
fields.caption: Leave empty for random.

fields.title: Visit/Encounter Number
fields.caption: Leave empty for random.

fields.title: Patient Class
fields.caption: Patient classification.

fields.title: Assigned Location
fields.caption: Format: ROOM^BED^FLOOR (e.g., ROOM101^BED1^FLOOR1). Leave empty for random.

fields.title: Admit Date/Time
fields.caption: Format: YYYYMMDDHHmm (e.g., 202601151030). Leave empty for current.

fields.title: Discharge Date/Time
fields.caption: Format: YYYYMMDDHHmm. Used for A03 discharge events. Leave empty for random future date.

fields.title: Admit Reason
fields.caption: Reason for admission. Leave empty for random.

fields.title: Diagnosis Code (ICD-10)
fields.caption: ICD-10 code (e.g., J18.9). Leave empty for random.

fields.title: Diagnosis Description
fields.caption: Description of diagnosis. Leave empty for random.

fields.title: Sending Application
fields.caption: Name of sending application. Default: XYOPS

fields.title: Sending Facility
fields.caption: Name of sending facility. Default: HOSPITAL

fields.title: Receiving Application
fields.caption: Name of receiving application. Default: RECEIVER

fields.title: Receiving Facility
fields.caption: Name of receiving facility. Default: CLINIC

tools.title: HL7 Message Parser
tools.description: Parse, analyze, and validate HL7 v2.x messages.

fields.title: Data Source
fields.value: Use text field below [field], Load from file [file], Use bucket data [bucket]
fields.caption: Choose where to get the HL7 message.

fields.title: HL7 Message
fields.caption: Paste your HL7 message here.

fields.title: File Path
fields.caption: Path to .hl7 file (when source is 'Load from file').

fields.title: Bucket Data Path
fields.caption: Dot-notation path to the HL7 message in bucket (e.g., 'hl7Message'). Leave empty for root level.
